activities: cSubs is a knowledge resource management and subscription services agency. The firm obtains orders for subscriptions and other knowledge resources from customers, and forwards those orders to one or more of many thousands of publishers on the customer's behalf, for fulfillment. The order includes name, address, and related information provided to cSubs by the customer, which cSubs, in turn, provides to publishers. This information is required because subscriptions must be sent by publishers, either by post or electronically, to the customer who placed the order.
personaldata: Name, delivery address, corporate email address, company name, business units (optional), phone (optional), job title (optional)
recoursemech: United States Council for International Business
